title: Benito finishes homework for pizza reward

content.question: Benitoâ€™s father says that if Benito finishes his homework, they can go out for pizza. Benito, who hates doing homework, finishes quickly because he is excited to get pizza. The scenario can be best explained through which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
